Text: Thanks for the upload.Having said that this was garbage,complete garbage.

I liked the scene with he and Dick, other than that, yes, like the entire run of this 'critically acclaimed' series, its a jumbled mess of crap. The fact that DC has made it continuity is infuriating.

I know that it will be undone soon enough, but I am still annoyed by it, quite a bit.
that scene is touching. glad they at least gave that nod to their B & R team.
I picked up Detective Comics #18 today, and was wondering why Batman was holding Damien's cape. Now I have to read this issue. I hate when they combine storylines.
